name: Mubarak Technologies Pte. Ltd.
description: Developer of online ordering and delivery software designed to take online orders directly from the websites. The company's software features customer engagement tools, ordering channels, reporting dashboards, and order trends, enabling businesses to access customer data with analytics to make informed decisions and break their dependency on food delivery aggregators.
one_liner: Developer of online ordering and delivery software designed to take online orders directly from the websites. The company's software features customer engagement tools, ordering channels, reporting dashboards, and order trends, enabling businesses to access customer data with analytics to make informed decisions and break their dependency on food delivery aggregators.
